title: Spatial Consistency Learning Strategy for Enhancing Object Detection Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Training for practitioners on the application of AI technology within corporate settings.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze spatial characteristics of ambiguous regions (Decoy Objects) that occur in object detection
Learners can explain the differences between conventional loss functions and spatial consistency loss (SCLoss)
Learners can simulate SCLoss application cases through microlearning in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
